subtitle: A tasty alternative to a salad nicoise, this makes an ideal main meal salad.

method.text: Heat the butter in a frying pan. Add the bread and fry for 1-2 min until crisp and brown. Drain well on kitchen paper.
Blend the tuna and potato together with a little mayonnaise or yogurt if liked.
Arrange the lettuce in a serving dish, with tomato, cucumber and beans. Add the tuna and potato mixture.
Top with the croutons and serve.

title: Tuna crouton salad
